item.description:
Weekly singles dances at hotels and restaurants in Mass. & RI.
Monthly dinners for 20 men and 20 women.
Upscale cocktail parties for single professionals.

Singles vacations...Bermuda cruises. Italy, Dominican Republic, Aruba, and other islands of the Caribbean.

HUNDREDS OF SINGLES 35-65 years old.
Dancing to Award-winning DJ.
FREE door prizes

SPLIT-THE-POT raffles 
MATCH meeting game for prizes.
FREE dance lessons at most locations.
Our non-membership, open-to-the-public, organization is the best way for single professionals to meet and socialize. Recognized by several media companies as a premier socializing organization.
For singles and couples 35-65 yrs. old.
Numerous weddings and long term relationships has been generated by attendees.
At present, events held in Holiday Inns in Tewksbury, Peabody, Rockland, and Woburn,
Sheraton Hotels in Wakefield, Norwood, Plymouth, and Milford,
Marriott Hotel in Marlborough, Christina's in Foxboro, The Lantana in Randolph, The Lafayette House in Foxboro, the Best Western in Waltham, White's in Westport, and Crown Plaza Hotel in Warwick, RI.
www.se-4u.com
www.nesinglescruises.com

'THE LARGEST SINGLES DANCE & ACTIVITIES ORGANIZATION IN NEW ENGLAND.'
item.name: 'SINGLES WITH STYLE' SINGLES DANCES
